titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 20 South Main in Beaver, Utah, as the "Abe Murdock United States Post Office Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E179)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Miss Collins (MI) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 306 - 3 (Roll no. 177).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 126.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Designates the facility of the U.S. Postal Service located at 20 South Main in Beaver, Utah, as the Abe Murdock United States Post Office Building.
